description.value:
Activation: 1

You enter an aggressive, squared stance that favors swift flurries of decisive blows.

While in this stance, you gain an advantage on Intimidation tests. Additionally, while there is exactly one enemy within your reach and none of your allies are within the reach of that enemy or you, you can use 0 to gain 1, which you can spend only to @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.actions.Item.8yQ5MMIrywehKyTS]{Gain Advantage} or use an action that includes an attack test targeting that enemy.
